alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Guadalupe, central Atascosa and Wilson Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 950 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Sutherland Springs to near Leming. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seguin, Pleasanton, Floresville, Stockdale, Elmendorf, La Vernia, Kingsbury, New Berlin, Sutherland Springs, Canada Verde and Graytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
